name: SKELEQUEST (TonyG, jrockefeller)
description:
Skelequest is a challenging platformer with a twist! Created for SGDA Summer Game Jam 2022, this game utilizes the theme "Game Over is not the End" in a wacky way to mix platforming segments with a boss battle. Created in under a week by Joshua Rockholt (Artist) and Anthony Garcia-Cortes (Programmer).

Sound Credits:  tinyurl.com/skelequest
